name: Squares of Inferno
description:
Based on the Divine Comedy by Dante, Squares of Inferno describes the mind-blowing journey of Moe, an average human being, who is trying to escape the fires of hell alongside his close friend the Grimreaper.
Help them run away trough 9 fascinating mini-games that will make you question everything you tought you knew about the very essence of art.

"DIS IZ THE BEST GEM I EVER PLAYD 9000/10"
- xX_WonderWiener99_Xx

"Redefining the way we think of game design and narration, this game taught me a lot. A true masterpiece."
- Hideo Kojima

"I never truly understood the meaning of love until I played Squares of Inferno. Thank you for everything."
- Karl Marx

Made for the Nokia Game Jam 2

WARNING : some scenes contain some explicit allusions and may therefore not be appropriate to younger audiences
